mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_news_banners(banner_news_number, admin_number, banner_image_files_number, banner_title, banner_content, banner_link_url, banner_created_date, banner_updated_date) VALUES (seq_news_items.nextval, #{adminNumber}, #{bannerImageFilesNumber}, #{newsTitle}, #{bannerContent}, #{bannerLinkUrl}, TO_DATE(#{bannerCreatedDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), TO_DATE(#{bannerUpdatedDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'))
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_news_banners SET news_title = #{newsTitle}, news_link_url = #{newsLinkUrl}, news_created_date = TO_DATE(#{newsCreatedDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), news_updated_date = TO_DATE(#{newsUpdatedDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') WHERE news_number = #{bannerNewsNumber}
